Package com.brightcove.player.display

Interface Summary
SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent.SeamlessEvent  
 

Class Summary
SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent This class extends the VideoDisplayComponent to add support for HLS on Android 2.3+ and seamless transitions between videos in a playlist.
VideoDisplayComponent The VideoDisplayComponent wraps the Brightcove EventEmitter around the lifecycle of the standard Android MediaPlayer API.
VideoStillDisplayComponent Provides a simple Component interface to load Video Still images from a Video object into an ImageView.
